Table.Pair: <>Force a plain black XMB background always </>
<>Copy a lines.qrc from the root of dev_usb000 to flash </>
<>Reinstall the official Playstation 3 wave from Sony </>

<>Press  to continue, Press  to go back.
This will copy a custom all black lines.qrc to /dev_blind/vsh/resource/qgl/</>
<>Current Wave will be overwritten, are you sure?</>

<>Press  to continue, Press  to go back.
This will copy a lines.qrc file from the root of dev_usb000/ to dev_blind/vsh/resources/qgl/ if it exists</>
<>Current Wave will be overwritten, are you sure?</>

<>Press  to continue, Press  to go back.
This will copy the official lines.qrc to /dev_blind/vsh/resource/qgl/</>

<>Press  to continue, Press  to go back.
This installs the theme, you still need to apply it from system settings</>
<>Manage coldboot start up sounds and more</>

<>Press  to continue, Press  to go back
This will rename the dev_blind/vsh/resource/coldboot_stereo.ac3 to coldboot_stereo.ac3.bak and rename the dev_blind/vsh/resource/coldboot_multi.ac3 to coldboot_multi.ac3.bak</>

<>Current Coldboot Sounds will be overwritten, are you sure?</>

This will copy the official coldboot_*.ac3 files to dev_blind/vsh/resource/</>

This copies modified gameboot files to flash
 Warning: Soft brick on HEN, CFW Only </>

<>Press  to continue, Press  to go back
This copies the official game_ext_plugin.sprx to flash</>
<>Enable custom gameboots for different game types </>
<>Disable custom gameboots for different game types </>

<>Press  to continue (Reboot Required), Press  to go back
This copies a modified custom_render_plugin.rco to flash and some resources to HDD Note 1: This feature requires the latest webMAN MOD 1.47.35 or newer Note 2: This requires at least Cobra 8.2 or higher.</>

<>Press  to continue, Press  to go back
This copies official custom_render_plugin.rco to flash Note 1: Reboot after enabling this option to see the changes Note 2: Delete the dev_hdd0/tmp/gameboot/game_ext_plugin.sprx if you want to stop wMM enabling the original gameboot by remapping that file</>
